question: According to the recent report conducted in January 2020 in the Bhitarkanika National Park of Odisha, the population of which of the following species showed an increasing trend?
explanation: According to the recent report conducted in January 2020 in the Bhitarkanika National Park of Odisha, Saltwater Crocodile showed an increasing trend. In the year 2018, it was 1742 and as per the recent report, it is 1757.
